thread.title: JUDITH BROOKSBANK

author: JUDITH BROOKSBANK
title: JUDITH BROOKSBANK
text: Our two lights were delivered promptly and well packed. They have been installed in our bathroom by a qualified electrician (Debbie of Walton Electricians). They are earthed so are suitable for a bathroom. They have a brass finish and the design is suitable for our Arts & Crafts house, and seem to me a little like ships' lights.They cast a pattern of light and shade which is very attractive.
